text_block_list.text: On one certain night―
I saw Mejiro Mcqueen studying in the cafeteria at a late hour.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Substitute in this formula to calculate… and then… I see.
choice_data_list: You're still studying at this time?
You're still studying at this time?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Ah, Trainer. Yes, that's right. Just a little 
review to prepare for tomorrow's quiz.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
But there were some difficult parts, 
and it took longer than I expected.
choice_data_list:
In that case, should we reduce 
training time tomorrow?

In that case, should we reduce 
training time tomorrow?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
No, there's no need to go that far. As a Mejiro horsegirl, it's only 
natural to be able to balance both academics and training.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Therefore, let's proceed with tomorrow's 
training as usual. I look forward to it.

As per the request of Mejiro Mcqueen, training 
continued as usual the following day.
However…

Perhaps due to exhaustion from last night's study, Mejiro 
Mcqueen looked sleepy during the meeting after training.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Hyah!?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
W-why of course I'm awake! A horsegirl of the 
proud Mejiro family would never doze off!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: If I'm not mistaken, we were reflecting on today's training…?

Given the situation, it might be a good idea to go over this again. 
Thinking that, I began to review the training once more, but―

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
choice_data_list: Just as I thought, you're sleeping, right…?
Just as I thought, you're sleeping, right…?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: I-I swear I'm not sleeping! You must be mistaken, Trainer.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
So, please go ahead and continue. 
I will make sure to pay attention.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Huh…? But the meeting should still be in progress―
choice_data_list:
I don't want you to push yourself too 
hard and collapse like you did before.

I don't want you to push yourself too 
hard and collapse like you did before.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: …! That's…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: …… It seems that I've caused you to worry, Trainer.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: I don't want to cause you any more trouble, so let's call it a day.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: I appreciate your concern, Trainer.
choice_data_list: Please make sure to get a proper night's sleep.
Please make sure to get a proper night's sleep.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Ugh…!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: I will have to correct you on that particular concern!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
I have been getting proper sleep, and I certainly 
wasn't dozing off just then, either!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: At least that much is true! I really, really, mean it!!

It seems like Mejiro McQueen, who keeps her weaknesses 
to herself, will need continued support to ensure she doesn't 
push herself too hard.
